Tell Us More

Hello, bonjour, नमस्ते !

I am Md Sajid Anis, currently pursuing Computer Science and Engineering from Gurukula. I am passionate about machine learning and computer vision along with app development. I also have basic knowledge about docker and hyperledger. I'm no stranger to hard work and my strength is I am flexible with work hours and time bounds. I am always curious to learn something new.




Special Skills

AI

Artificial Intelligence always amused me. In my journey of learning "how to make machine learn", I have learned and worked on OpenCV, Tensorflow, Keras etc. and have made some projects using them.

App Development

My love towards App development first ignited when I came across the infamous game Mario, I started from there and now I have experience in Android studio, Flutter and Unity.

Explore New Skills

Apart from App and AI, I always try to learn extra skills and update my skillset. I have basic knowledge of Bootstrap Studio, Hyperledger, Blockchain, System Software, MongoDB, Qiskit etc.

My Recent Projects

Blockchain Powered Evidence Management

Digital Evidence Management by converting the typed or printed documents into legible text format and storing it using its hash value to protect its integrity and being admissible to a court of law.

Arms Detector

A CNN based object detection neural network to detect arms and ammunition for smart home systems.

Shopify

An e-commerce android and ios application based on flutter framework which provides basic online shopping facility from different retailers.
